properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 9:28AM CST until February 21 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Tombigbee River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tombigbee River near Amory
* from Thursday February 20 until Friday February 21.
* At 09 AM Thursday the stage was...16.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 20.1 feet on Friday February 21.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Thursday February 20 and
continue to rise to near 20.1 feet by Friday February 21. The river
will fall below flood stage by Friday February 21.
* At 20.0 feet...Lowland flooding begins.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
